General.Name: Youngtek Electronics
General.Description: Youngtek Electronics Corporation offers semiconductor back-end foundry services in Taiwan. The company engages in wafer testing, wafer grinding and cutting and die picking, IC product testing, special substrate cutting, test program development, platform conversion, engineering support, and valet shipping; and AOI automatic optical inspection of LED dies and VCSEL components, die picking inspection, visual inspection, and other back-end process foundry activities. It also provides OEM services, including gluing, die bonding, hot pressing, testing, and compounding. In addition, the company offers IC sorting and bonding; WLCSP die sorting packaging; label flip-chip binding; and die and LED bonding machines. Youngtek Electronics Corporation was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 5, Keji Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30078
